Name: An Idealized Statue of Amenhotep the Second
Description: This idealized standing image of Amenhotep the Second depicts him wearing a pleated Shendyt royal kilt and holding rolled cloths in both hands. He wears the Khat headdress, which is similar to the Nemes headdress, but is larger. It hangs down in a large section over the back. Amenhotep the Second is known from other portraits, which better show his strong and energetic personality
